name: May 2021
description:
For May 2021, I wanted to create something inspired by Kentucky Route Zero. I used the first scene - where Conway stops at Equus Oils - as a guide for the level and interactions. Something that I love about that scene is that is builds a world around characters and relationships, rather than through exposition. You're thrown into what feels like a rich environment, full of history and mystery. I tried to do the same here. 

I recently moved to London, and I've been enjoying navigating the underground in all of all of its beauty and intrigue and grime.  That felt like a good backdrop for a Kentucky Route Zero-like story about delivering a letter.
